alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:37PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Collier County through 530 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Golden Gate Estates, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, North Naples, East Naples, Big Cypress National Preserve, Lely, South Blocks Golde, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Miles City and Fiddlers Creek. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons participating in outdoor activities should seek sturdy shelter until this storm passes. Open shelters found in parks, beaches, or golf courses offer no protection from the dangers of lightning.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
